title: Topic 005 Question 049
body: You have an Azure subscription that contains an Azure key vault named KeyVault1 and the virtual machines shown in the following table.
You set the Key Vault access policy to Enable access to Azure Disk Encryption for volume encryption.
KeyVault1 is configured as shown in the following exhibit.
For each of the following statements, select Yes if the statement is true. Otherwise, select No.
NOTE: Each correct selection is worth one point.
